Question: What happened to the battlefield in the Black Myth: Wukong Gamescom 2023 demo?
Options: A. The tiger vanguard died and left a pool of blood.
B. Players were so good at the game that they didn't spill any blood.
C. The players who fought the tiger vanguard spilled so much blood that it formed a pool.
D. The tiger vanguard was so powerful that it spilled blood from players who fought it.
